mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) as CNT FROM approval_line aa, user bb,team cc, level dd, doc_list ee, chmod ff WHERE aa.user_idx = bb.idx AND aa.isDel ='N' AND cc.idx = bb.team AND dd.idx = bb.chmod AND ee.doc_num = aa.doc_type AND ff.idx = bb.chmod
AND (aa.user_idx = '${myidx}' or aa.approval_wait = '${myidx}' or approval_chk LIKE '%${myidx}%' or(aa.approval_wait ='' and '${isManager}'='Y'))
and bb.use_yn='Y'
AND aa.imsi_yn ='${imsi_yn}'
AND bb.NAME LIKE '%${search_name}%'
AND aa.submit_date >= concat(REPLACE('${start_ymd}','-',''),'000000')
AND aa.submit_date <= concat(REPLACE('${end_ymd}','-',''),'000000')
AND aa.doc_type = '${doc_type_search}'
AND case when aa.doc_type ='100' then (SELECT cont FROM doc_guntae WHERE idx=aa.doc_idx) when aa.doc_type ='101' then (SELECT cont FROM doc_jicul WHERE idx=aa.doc_idx) when aa.doc_type ='102' then (SELECT cont FROM doc_jumal WHERE idx=aa.doc_idx) when aa.doc_type ='103' then (SELECT cont FROM doc_yeonjang WHERE idx=aa.doc_idx) when aa.doc_type ='104' then (SELECT cont FROM doc_roundrobin WHERE idx=aa.doc_idx) when aa.doc_type ='105' then (SELECT cont FROM doc_prize WHERE idx=aa.doc_idx) END LIKE '%${content_search}%'
AND aa.step='${step_search}'

SELECT aa.*, bb.NAME as kor_nm, cc.team_kr, dd.NAME as level_nm, ee.doc_name FROM approval_line aa, user bb,team cc, level dd, doc_list ee, chmod ff WHERE aa.user_idx = bb.idx AND aa.isDel ='N' AND cc.idx = bb.team AND dd.idx = bb.level AND ee.doc_num = aa.doc_type AND ff.idx = bb.chmod
AND (aa.user_idx = '${myidx}' or aa.ref_line like '%${myidx}%' or aa.approval_wait = '${myidx}' or approval_chk LIKE '%${myidx}%' or(aa.approval_wait ='' and '${isManager}'='Y'))
and bb.use_yn='Y'
AND aa.imsi_yn ='${imsi_yn}'
AND bb.NAME LIKE '%${search_name}%'
AND aa.submit_date >= concat(REPLACE('${start_ymd}','-',''),'000000')
AND aa.submit_date <= concat(REPLACE('${end_ymd}','-',''),'000000')
AND aa.doc_type = '${doc_type_search}'
AND case when aa.doc_type ='100' then (SELECT cont FROM doc_guntae WHERE idx=aa.doc_idx) when aa.doc_type ='101' then (SELECT cont FROM doc_jicul WHERE idx=aa.doc_idx) when aa.doc_type ='102' then (SELECT cont FROM doc_jumal WHERE idx=aa.doc_idx) when aa.doc_type ='103' then (SELECT cont FROM doc_yeonjang WHERE idx=aa.doc_idx) when aa.doc_type ='104' then (SELECT cont FROM doc_roundrobin WHERE idx=aa.doc_idx) when aa.doc_type ='105' then (SELECT cont FROM doc_prize WHERE idx=aa.doc_idx) END LIKE '%${content_search}%'
AND aa.step='${step_search}'
order by aa.idx desc limit ${s_rownum}, ${e_rownum}

SELECT (select name from user where idx=aa.user_idx) as kor_nm, aa.* FROM approval_line aa WHERE aa.idx = '${idx}' AND (aa.approval_wait = '${myidx}' or aa.user_idx = '${myidx}' or aa.approval_chk like '%${myidx}%' or '${isManager}' ='Y')
SELECT * FROM ${doc_nm} WHERE doc_type ='${doc_type}' and idx ='${doc_idx}'
SELECT NAME FROM chmod WHERE idx = (SELECT chmod FROM user WHERE idx='${useridx}')
SELECT bb.team_kr, cc.NAME AS chmod_nm FROM user aa, team bb, chmod cc WHERE aa.idx='${myidx}' AND aa.team = bb.idx AND aa.chmod = cc.idx
mapper.update: update approval_line set step ='${step}', approval_wait ='${waiter}', approval_chk ='${approval_chk}', approval_date ='${approval_date}', approval_content ='${approval_content}' where idx ='${idx}'
update approval_line set step ='반려', return_idx ='${myidx}', return_why ='${content}', return_date = now()+0 where idx ='${idx}'
update approval_line set step ='결재', approval_final ='${myidx}', final_date = now()+0 where idx ='${idx}'
mapper.select: SELECT method FROM pay_method WHERE idx = '${pay_method}'

select (SELECT concat(aa.idx,'_',aa.doc_type) FROM approval_line aa, user bb,team cc, level dd, doc_list ee, chmod ff WHERE aa.user_idx = bb.idx AND aa.isDel='N' AND aa.imsi_yn='N' AND cc.idx = bb.team AND dd.idx = bb.chmod AND ee.doc_num = aa.doc_type AND ff.idx = bb.chmod AND (aa.user_idx = '${myidx}' or aa.approval_wait = '${myidx}' or approval_chk LIKE '%${myidx}%' or(aa.approval_wait ='' and '${isManager}'='Y')) AND aa.idx < '${idx}' ORDER BY aa.idx desc LIMIT 1) AS prev_idx,
(SELECT concat(aa.idx,'_',aa.doc_type) FROM approval_line aa, user bb,team cc, level dd, doc_list ee, chmod ff WHERE aa.user_idx = bb.idx AND aa.isDel='N' AND aa.imsi_yn='N' AND cc.idx = bb.team AND dd.idx = bb.chmod AND ee.doc_num = aa.doc_type AND ff.idx = bb.chmod AND (aa.user_idx = '${myidx}' or aa.approval_wait = '${myidx}' or approval_chk LIKE '%${myidx}%' or(aa.approval_wait ='' and '${isManager}'='Y')) AND aa.idx > '${idx}' ORDER BY aa.idx asc LIMIT 1) AS next_idx
